content.title: Revolved Head to Knee Pose Instructions

items: Start in a seated position with your legs extended in front of you.
Bend your right knee and bring the sole of your right foot to rest against your left inner thigh.
Place your right hand on your right knee and inhale as you lengthen your spine.
Exhale and twist your torso to the left, bringing your left hand to rest on your right foot or ankle.
Hold the pose for several breaths, then release and repeat on the other side.
